description:
Ride in the rain with peace of mind, knowing your gear will remain dry. The Monsoon Onceanweave pannier is highly waterproof and spacious, with plenty of reflective elements and light attachments to ensure you stay visible. Easy on-off hardware is a breeze to use when coming or going.

  • Polyurethane-coated Oceanweave® fabric made with reclaimed fishnets
  • Hydracore® liner provides IPX5 waterproofness
  • Internal backboard keeps the pannier's shape
  • Rixen & Kaul® attachment system fits rails 6 to 16mm
  • Removeable padded laptop sleeve plus pockets for organization
  • Daisy chain loops provide attachments for extra gear
  • Reflective accents and light loops on both sides
  • Webbing carry handles
name: Axiom Monsoon Oceanweave P18+ Urban Pannier
